SELECT
CASE WHEN t1.type = 0 THEN ( SELECT t2.title FROM zzb_complain t2 WHERE t2.id = t1.foreign_id ) WHEN t1.type = 1 THEN ( SELECT t2.title FROM zmj_report t2 WHERE t2.id = t1.foreign_id ) END AS title,
CASE WHEN t1.type = 0 THEN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t2.complain_date,"%Y-%m-%d %T") FROM zzb_complain t2 WHERE t2.id = t1.foreign_id ) WHEN t1.type = 1 THEN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t2.report_date,"%Y-%m-%d %T") FROM zmj_report t2 WHERE t2.id = t1.foreign_id ) END AS reportDate,
t1.id id, t1.points points, t1.telephone telephone FROM jacg_integrate t1;

select
t1.id id, t1.phoneNumber phoneNumber, t1.points points
from jacg_integrate t1
left join zmj_report t2 on t1.reportId = t2.id
where t1.id = #{id}
